name: Shatter (itch) (ThatGuyNik)
description:
What comes up to your mind when you think of breaking something... your bones exactly. Shoot yourself as far and as high as you possibly can to accumulate a higher score. There are different bonuses all around you. Some might help you, while others won't. (Had some more ideas but due to time shortage they had to be cut).

Assets by MrMominski

Made for the Mini Jam 87:  Break
